names.pinyin: zhi tong ru shen tang jia wei

actions: Cools the Blood,stops bleeding and clears Toxic Heat.
With Huai Hua Mi, for hot, bleeding hemorrhoids or other Intestinal bleeding.
Cools the Blood and stops bleeding.
With Huang Qin, for pathogenic Heat injuring the collaterals in Intestinal Wind with hemafecia, bleeding hemorrhoids or menorrhagia.
With Di Yu, for hot, bleeding hemorrhoids or other Intestinal bleeding.
Strongly dries Dampness, tonifies the Spleen and clears Dampness from the Lower Jiao.
With Huang Bai, for Damp-sores.
Tonifies, activates and harmonizes the Blood, moistens the Intestines, unblocks the bowels, reduces swelling, expels pus, generates flesh and alleviates pain.
Drains Damp-Heat especially from the Lower Jiao, drains Kidney Fire, drains Fire and relieves Fire toxicity.
With Cang Zhu, eliminates Dampness and clears Heat for Lower Jiao Damp-Heat and Damp-Heat sores.
With Huai Hua Mi, Di Yu and Fang Feng, for bleeding hemorrhoids.
Regulates Qi, reduces accumulations, drains downward and unblocks the bowels.
Expels Wind-Dampness, alleviates pain, relieves diarrhea and stops bleeding.
Promotes urination, leaches out Dampness and drains Damp-Heat from the lower Jiao.
Drains Heat, purges accumulations, clears Heat, transforms Dampness, promotes urination, activates the Blood, dispels Blood Stasis and reduces Fire toxicity.
With Dang Gui, for Blood Stasis.
Expels Wind-Dampness, clears Deficiency Heat, resolves Dampness, moistens the Intestines and unblocks the bowels.
With Huang Qi and Cang Zhu, for Damp-Heat jaundice.
Breaks up Blood Stasis, activates Blood circulation, moistens the Intestines, unblocks the bowels and drains abscesses.
With Da Huang, for severe abdominal infections.
Clears Heat
Disinhibits Dampness
Dispels Stasis
Scatters nodulations

symptoms: Possible protrusion which looks dull red in color and ulcerated
A hot, burning distended feeling in the anus, winch is worse during defecation

modifications.purpose: a severe, hot, burning, distended feeling in the anus
a lack of constipation, uneasy defecation or dry stools
